content:
The overall fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 30.03.24 is approximately:

  • personnel - 441 520 (+730) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6951 (+29)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13284 (+20)
  • artillery systems - 11006 (+15)
  • RSWW - 1023 (0)
  • air defense facilities - 736 (+1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8701 (+45)
  • Winged missiles - 2046 (+24)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14670 (+25)
  • Special Technique - 1814 (+7)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 30.03.24.
title: Minus 730 invaders, 29 tanks and 20 BBM were destroyed: Russian losses per day
author: Army Inform
